subject: Re: Parameterized improvement
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "toalexsmail" <toalexsmail@...> wrote:
>
> I was very exciting to know that JUnit 4 has Parameterized feature. I
> have used almost exact the same mechanism in JUnit 3.8 for making the
> parametrized test. There is one little disappoint though. Now every
> parametrized method must be in separate class that is not very good.
> Even if there is 2 [b]related[/b] tests it is impossible to use the
> same in the single class. That is because Parameterized runner expects
> only one constructor. So neither another parameterized, neither
> regular test can't be added. I think this should be revisited.
>

See also related feater request
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=365278&aid=1626414&group_id=15278
